title: UI/Views - Components and Routes
description: User interface layer. SvelteKit routes, shadcn-svelte components, views for issues, board, and epics.

title: Setup shadcn-svelte + Iconify
description: Initialize shadcn-svelte with button, card, dialog, table, badge, tabs, command, dropdown-menu. Install @iconify/svelte. Create StatusBadge, PriorityBadge, TypeIcon.

title: App shell layout
description: Main layout with AppShell, Sidebar (repo list), Header (search, breadcrumbs). Create app state store with Svelte 5 runes.

title: Repo management UI
description: UI for adding/removing/importing repos. AddRepoDialog, RepoCard components. Folder scan with results display.

title: Issues list view
description: Main issues list at /repos/[repoId]/issues. IssueTable with search, filters, sorting. Inline status editing.

title: Issue detail panel
description: IssueSheet side panel for viewing/editing single issue. Markdown rendering, inline editing, status updates.

title: Kanban board view
description: Board view at /repos/[repoId]/board. 4 columns: Blocked, Ready, In Progress, Closed. Drag-and-drop support.

title: Epics view
description: Epics view at /repos/[repoId]/epics. EpicCard with progress bars. Expandable to show child issues.

title: Dashboard
description: Cross-repo dashboard at /. Show stats from all repos, recent activity, quick links.

title: API Layer - REST Endpoints
description: REST API layer. SvelteKit +server.ts endpoints for repos and issues CRUD operations.

title: Repos API endpoints
description: REST endpoints for repo management: GET/POST /api/repos, GET/DELETE/PATCH /api/repos/[repoId]. Validate paths, return stats.

title: Issues API endpoints
description: REST endpoints for issues: GET/POST /api/repos/[id]/issues, GET/PATCH/DELETE /api/repos/[id]/issues/[issueId]. Filtering, sorting, pagination.

title: Batch import endpoint
description: POST /api/repos/import - Scan folder for beads repos and import all. Return imported, skipped, and error counts.

title: Foundation - Types, Parser, Config Services
description: Core foundation layer. TypeScript interfaces, markdown issue parser, app config service, repo validator.

title: TypeScript type definitions
description: Define all TypeScript interfaces in src/lib/types/beads.ts: Issue, IssueType, IssueStatus, Priority, BeadsConfig, ManagedRepo, AppConfig, API types, Socket event types.

title: Issue markdown parser
description: Implement markdown parser in src/lib/server/parser/issue-parser.ts: parseIssue() and serializeIssue() functions. Handle metadata extraction and section parsing.

title: App config service
description: Service to manage ~/.beads-sv/config.json in src/lib/server/services/app-config.ts: load/save config, CRUD for managed repos, generate unique repo IDs.

title: Repo validator service
description: Service to validate beads repos in src/lib/server/services/repo-validator.ts: validateBeadsRepo(), scanForBeadsRepos() for folder import.

title: Real-time - socket.io Integration
description: Real-time communication with socket.io. File watching with chokidar, server-to-client events for live updates.

title: socket.io server setup
description: Initialize socket.io server alongside SvelteKit. Integrate with Vite dev server and production build. Room management for repo subscriptions.

title: File watcher service
description: Chokidar-based file watcher in src/lib/server/services/file-watcher.ts. Watch .beads/issues/*.md, emit socket events on changes.

title: Client socket store
description: Svelte 5 runes store for socket.io client in src/lib/stores/socket.svelte.ts. Auto-reconnect, room subscriptions, trigger data refresh.
